title: Aural set, El Capitan - change in meter

content.description: You will hear an excerpt for concert band. The first section of the excerpt, which consists of the introduction and first main section, will be played once; then the second section will be played twice. Before listening to each section, please read the questions.
content.question: Over the course of the second section, the meter

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Use symbols and terms to describe features of rhythm in performed music, including meter, note values, and rhythmic patterns and devices.
